text: Krombacher Brauerei is one of the largest private owned breweries in Germany and the best selling German beer in 2015.FAZ.net Bierblog Their headquarters are in Kreuztal, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. == References == == Other websites == *Krombacher Official Page Category:Companies of Germany Category:German beers Category:North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Krombacher Brauerei
